detail.description: An human readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: An absolute URI that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem. It may or may not yield further information if dereferenced.

status.description: The HTTP status code generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. It SHOULD NOTchange from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localisation.

type.description: An absolute URI that identifies the problem type.  When dereferenced, it SHOULD provide human-readable documentation for the problem type (e.g., using HTML).
